response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that is truly invaluable. This product holds immense significance and has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. Given its unique attributes and unparalleled quality, it is worth $1,200,000 to me. However, I am willing to extend a special offer to you, recognizing your discerning taste and appreciation for exceptional items. I propose to sell this remarkable product to you at a price of $1,100,000. I believe this offer presents a fantastic value for both of us and allows you to secure this masterpiece at a highly competitive rate. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this product into your collection.", "product_price": 1100000}
